sql.value: select kq.create_time,kq.question_naire_topic naireTitle,kqr.coupon_end_time couponEndTime,kq.write_num writeNum,kq.control_jing_ling_power JingLingPower,kq.web_access_path webUrl,kq.quertion_naire_state NaireState from kdjl_questionnaire kq left join kdjl_questionnaire_reward kqr on kq.guid=kqr.guid where 1=1 and kq.state=1
